alert.note: Alert for Benton; Lafayette; Marshall; Tippah; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 8:48AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lafayette, northwestern Union, southern Marshall, western Tippah and southern Benton Counties through 915 AM CDT... At 848 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wall Doxey State Park, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Holly Springs, Wall Doxey State Park, Cambridge, Etta, Bethlehem, Laws Hill, Hickory Flat, Potts Camp, Myrtle, Abbeville, Malone, Keel, Waterford, Spring Hill, Higdon, Gilton, Lake Center, Galena, Bethel and Winborn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
